title: BMC Leaves WorldTour in 2024 as AG2R-Citroën Partnership Ends
content:
The Swiss bike brand will continue its sponsorship of the Tudor Pro Cycling ProTeam after extending its deal for six seasons.

Read the full article at BMC Leaves WorldTour in 2024 as AG2R-Citroën Partnership Ends on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
